version_description:
-Location can be added to your project automatically when you do surveys: weâ€™re working on some cool new features and products that will make use of this, so stay tuned! If you wish to disable saving the location, you can do so from the user information view (just click on the user icon at the top left of the project list view)
-Fixing an issue where duplicated timestamps would sometimes appear in autopilot surveys 
-Other small stability improvements and bug fixes
